It will stop the identification process here.
Please give a feedback, it will help us improve our service.

axt_biometric_consent_title: Capture of your face: choice of processing

axt_biometric_selfie_content: We need to check your identity by comparing your face with the photo on your identity document.

axt_error_browser_unsupported_descriptio: Your browser is not supported. Please try again with another browser or device.
axt_error_camera_access_denied_descripti: You denied access to your camera. The onboarding cannot go further.
axt_error_camera_access_timeout_descript: We cannot access your camera. This step is required to verify your identity. If the problem still occurs, please consider trying with a different browser or device.
axt_error_camera_busy_description: Your camera can't be access. Another application is already blocking your camera.
axt_error_camera_notfound_description: Please make sure you have a camera or a sound card.
axt_error_connectivity_description: Please find a place with network availability.
axt_error_link_description: This link is not valid anymore, it has been canceled or you have already submitted all required documents.
axt_error_nodoc_description: You have to provide at least one document.
axt_error_quality_brightness_title: The image provided shows light reflections.
axt_error_quality_heterogeneous_mrz_desc: Make sure there is no reflection or dirt on your document.
axt_error_quality_picture_blurred_error_: Make sure the image is not blurry and has no glare.
axt_error_quality_picture_blurred_warn_d: Make sure the image is not blurry and has no glare.
axt_error_quality_picture_color_grey_or_: The image provided is in black and white.
axt_error_quality_picture_resolution_ins: The resolution of your image is too low.
axt_error_quality_truncated_document_des: Make sure your entire document is visible, with no obstructions between your device and your document (a finger may interfere with the capture of your photo).
axt_error_quality_truncated_document_tit: Your image does not appear in its entirety.
axt_error_quality_truncated_mrz_descript: Make sure your entire document is visible, with no obstructions between your device and your document (a finger may interfere with the capture of your photo).
axt_error_quality_truncated_mrz_title: Your image does not appear in its entirety.
axt_error_quality_unknown_description: Provide a better quality image. Higher resolution, no glare and no finger covering parts of your document.
axt_error_quality_unknown_title: The image provided has quality problems.
axt_error_service_description: An error occurred while using our service, please click again on the link you have received.
axt_error_video_invalid_description: The video cannot be processed. Please try again with another browser.
axt_etsi_consent_data_privacy_web: I authorise Ariadnext on behalf of {customer} to process my biometric data in accordance with the data protection policy.
axt_etsi_consent_title: We protect your data and rights
axt_etsi_document_capture_description: Only the following documents are accepted: romanian electronic identity card, romanian identity card, passport.
axt_legal_mentions_data_recipient_conten: The analyzed data are intended to be processed only by our company. The data are not intended for any other organisation. Moreover, no data transfer outside the European Union is carried out.
axt_legal_mentions_data_retention_conten: ID documents will be stored for a maximum of 30 days. This maximum period may be reduced, if specified in the contract.
axt_legal_mentions_data_rights_content:
You can access and obtain a copy of the data, ask to correct or erase them. You also have the right to limit their processing.
What are my data protection rights ?
If, after contacting us, you consider that your rights on your data are not respected, you can send a claim (complaint) to your domestic supervisory authority.
axt_legal_mentions_description: The data collected as part of this registration allows us to verify your identity. Processed data is carried out in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
axt_legal_mentions_exercing_your_rights_:
ARIADNEXT's Data Protection Officer (DPO) is your contact person for any request related to this data processing.

  • Contact the DPO by email
    {email}
  • Contact the DPO by postal mail
    122 Rue Robert Keller
    35510 Cesson-Sévigné
axt_legal_mentions_link: Learn more about managing your data and your rights.
axt_legal_mentions_processed_data_conten:
According to the CNIL (french supervisory authority), the categories of data processed are as follows:
  • civil status
  • Identity
  • identification data
  • images

This data is collected from the user and leads to a decision that can be automated.
axt_legal_mentions_purpose_data_analysis: Purpose of data processing is to verify the user's identity through a series of automated checks, mostly based on the validity check of one (or several) captured identity document(s).
axt_legal_mentions_security_content:
In the meaning of the GDPR, any organization processing personal data is bound to an obligation of security. Thus, the following measures are implemented :
  • Obligation of confidentiality signed by all the employees processing the data of our customers
  • Encryption protects data both in storage and transit
  • Security audits are regularly carried out by third-party cybersecurity companies
axt_liveness_advice: Make sure you are in a quiet place before starting.
axt_liveness_consent_message: This analysis complies with the regulations related to personal data. In particular, extracted data will be destroyed once analyzed.
axt_liveness_consent_title: Your video recording will be automatically compared to your identity document thanks to biometrics.
axt_liveness_description: To avoid the risk of fraud, we will now ask you to perform actions in front of the camera.
axt_liveness_disconnected: The capture has been interrupted. You can continue when you are ready.
axt_liveness_doc_error: We were unable to verify your document.
axt_liveness_error: We were unable to verify your identity
axt_liveness_hand: Cover your eye with your hand
axt_liveness_network_too_slow: Your Internet connection is too slow. Please make sure you have a good network. You can try again when you are ready.
axt_liveness_tmd_turn: Turn your head slightly to the right

axt_liveness_waiting_camera: Allow the use of your camera
axt_liveness_waiting_description: Make sure you are in a quiet place before starting.

axt_tips_biometric_title: Advice to successfully capture your face
axt_tips_document_brightness: Avoid too dark or bright areas.
axt_tips_document_keep_center: Keep your document in the center of the canvas.
axt_tips_document_stabilize: Steady your document and camera as much as possible.

axt_tips_eyes: Keep your eyes on the camera.
axt_tips_face_keep_center: Keep your face in the target.
axt_tips_fingers: Do not hide visible areas with your fingers.
axt_tips_good_network: Make sure the network quality is good.
axt_tips_light: Avoid too dark or bright places.
axt_tips_remove_mask: Take your mask off before capturing your face.
axt_tips_slowly_turn_head: Turn slowly your head in the indicated direction
axt_tutorial_center_description: To position yourself correctly, align your face with the target.
axt_tutorial_tips_turn_head: Turn your head in the indicated direction

axt_verso_title: We are now going to capture the other side of your document

axt_video_resolution_too_low_error_descr: The camera resolution of your device does not allow you to proceed.
axt_waiting_description: Identity documents are evolving, and are now equipped with integrated electronic chips containing a lot of data. In addition to basic information, these documents contain a chip with a digitised image of the photograph and fingerprints of the document holder.
axt_welcome_message_authenticate: Authenticate to begin the documents capture
axt_welcome_message_default: To complete your registration, please add the required documents.
